skills.name: Find the opposite of a given integer
Know that 0 is the opposite of itself

explanations.A: 3 is 3 units away from 0 and -3 is also 3 units away from 0, making -3 the opposite of 3.
explanations.B: I think you may have confused the distance of the opposite from 3. The opposite has to be the same distance away from 0 as 3. What number is opposite of 3?
explanations.C: The opposite of 3 would be the same distance from 0 as 3 would be. 0 is its own opposite.
explanations.D: I think you may have confused opposite with absolute value. We are looking for the number that lies the same distance from 0 as 3 does. This number could be negative, unlike absolute value.
